title: Paddy Power Sports Betting
description:
€/£10 Risk Free First Bet | Paddy’s Rewards Club Offer €/£10 Every Week | T&C's Apply – details below.

Download our amazing new app today! It's packed full of great features to give you a fun betting experience! 

Same Game Multi
We’ve all been there. You really fancy a team to win, the main man up front looks nailed on to score first and there’s a particular centre back who was born yellow carded. Well, with our new Same Game Multi, you can now place this along with a whole host of different markets as a single bet to win bigger. To get cracking, just go to the Same Game Multi tab in all the top matches and create whatever bet you like.

Our app is quicker than ever. Incredibly fast load time and navigation. You’ll never miss a bet again.
 
Simple Navigation
It’s now even easier to find your selections. Our newly designed menus and tabs make it a quick and easy experience.  
 
Improved Design
We’ve given the app a well needed facelift to bring it into 2018. It’s optimised to look perfect on the latest iOS devices.

Horse Racing
Missed the race start? No hassle. You can now watch a race and bet live in-running on all horse races.

New In-Play Experience
Our new in-play home page makes it even easier to find and get a bet on. We have live streaming for over 100,000 sporting events each year.
Our live stats and visualisations offer you the latest information on all of the critical match moments.

#WhatOddsPaddy
Request odds for any sporting outcome via our twitter page. We’ll price it up and put it live on site so you can get involved in the action. The crazier the request, the better! Our traders love a challenge!

Quick Login
Need to get a bet on fast!? Get into your account quickly and securely with a 4-dgit Pin, Touch ID login or Face ID

Top Promotions
The Home of the Moneyback Special, Justice Payouts and Power Price enhancements. Our promotions won’t be matched

£/€10 Risk Free First Bet Offer T&Cs:

New customers only, residents of UK or Ireland.
Open a new account using promo code YSKA00
Deposit a minimum of £/€10 using a Debit/Credit Card or PayPal
Place a Sportsbook bet. Your first ever bet will be counted as the qualifying bet.
If your qualifying bet is settled as a loser we will refund you stake in CASH
Maximum refund is £/€10
Refund will be processed within 1 hour after the qualifying bet has been settled as a loser.
Sign up offers are limited to one per person, family, household address, email address, and shared computer. We reserve the right to withdraw the availability of free bet offers to any customers.
Deposits made with e-wallets including Skrill, Paysafe and Neteller will not count. Only Debit/Credit Cards and Paypal are eligible.
Customers registering through this offer are not eligible for any other sign up promo.
We reserve the right to exclude and/or limit the availability of the offer to certain customers.
Full T&C’s of Paddypower.com also apply
Full T&C’s: https://promos.paddypower.com/promotion?promoCode=CACQRF10YSKA00P

PADDY’S REWARDS CLUB T&Cs:

Applies to online, mobile, phone and text bets only. 
Qualify 1 of 3 ways each week:
•	Place 1 x £/€5 bet to receive a Power Up. 
•	Place 5 x £/€5 bets to receive a £/€5 free bet & a Power Up. 
•	Place 5 x £/€10 bets to receive a £/€10 free bet & a Power Up. 
Your qualifying bets can be placed on any sport and will qualify if the odds, or combined odds, are 1/2 (1.5) or greater.
Cashed out bets do not qualify.
Max free bet is £/€10 per week.
Max Power is 1 per week.
PP betting rules apply.
Full T&C’s: https://promotions.paddypower.com/paddysrewardsclub

title: Racing TV – Live horse racing
description:
Racing TV is the new home of British and Irish racing, our app features in-depth racecards with Timeform Premium ratings, tips from the best in the industry, the ability to bet with nine leading bookmakers including price comparison via Oddschecker, a fast results service and so much more!

Racing TV is the leading horse racing broadcaster, and our App will give you complete coverage from 61 of the top racecourses throughout Britain and Ireland.

The Racing TV app is a must have for all horse racing fans.

The new Racing TV app features:
- The very latest horse racing news
- In-depth racecards with Timeform Premium ratings
- Horse racing betting tips from the best in the industry
- Bet with nine leading bookmakers including price comparisons via Oddschecker
- Live streaming from 61 top British and Irish racecourses
- Live video from the paddock
- A fast results service direct to your phone or tablet


BETTING
The Racing TV App is seamlessly integrated with ten of the leading bookmakers in the industry, allowing you to check the very latest prices and offers before placing your bet.
The bookmakers include: Betfair, bet365, Sky Bet, Bet Victor, Paddy Power, Coral, Ladbrokes, Betway, BetBright and William Hill.
The app also includes a price comparison via Oddschecker to ensure you get the best odds for every racecard.
Register for a new account today, or login to your existing account, check your balance and deposit money via your preferred bookmaker. 

TIMEFORM
Timeform data can provide you with comprehensive analysis from the latest horse racing results, including star ratings and tips for upcoming racecards - available to all users of the Racing TV app.
All Group and Graded races are available from declarations, giving you all the expert analysis and statistics in order to make the most informed betting decision.


VIDEO
Watch live racing on the go from your phone or tablet; including enhanced video, form and full replays from our 61 racecourses across Britain and Ireland.

The pop-out video player on all digital devices will allow you to explore the Racing TV website, without missing any of the action. A full seven-day catch up service is available for all our Racing TV Members.

  Dedicated racecourse feeds are available for Racing TV members and Day Pass customers, including pre-parade, views from the paddock, going to post, the live race and presentations.

Watch uninterrupted coverage of your chosen course via the Racing TV app.

HORSE RACING RESULTS
 Get the latest horse racing results straight to your phone or tablet, with optional notifications to track your horse and watch the final furlong replay absolutely FREE.

Racing TV members get full access to the complete live race coverage.

Exclusive news and opinion  Get breaking news, opinion and analysis from our award-wining team. The Racing TV app will bring you all the latest horse racing news from the UK, Ireland and beyond.

Watch interviews with leading trainers, jockeys and owners, with integrated access to exclusive video and tips from The Betting Lab.

All the latest news for all the biggest races.

COVERAGE
Racing TV is the leading horse racing broadcaster, and our App will give you complete coverage from 61 of the top racecourses throughout Britain and Ireland.

Plus we have all the best horse racing action from around the world.

FEEDBACK
 We hope you enjoy the new Racing TV app, however we would like to hear any of your feedback and comments, please send them to customerservices@racinguk.com

Requirements:

· iOS devices using iOS 12.3 or later.

· Some features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

If you subscribe to any Apple TV channels, payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatical-ly renew unless they are cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Simultaneous streams may be limited on a per-subscription basis. The availability of Apple TV features, channels and related content may vary depending on the country or region from which you attempt to access them. title: CMC Trading: Spread Bet & CFDs
description:
Trade on stocks and shares, forex, indices, commodities and cryptos via spread bets or CFDs on our award-winning trading app*.

Brought to you by the Financial Services Provider of the Year (Shares Awards, 2018), CMC Markets’ online trading app allows you to trade the financial markets on the go, 24 hours a day, from Sunday night to Friday night.

Financial spread betting and CFD trading allows you to profit from rising and falling markets without owning the underlying asset. Remember, markets can also move against you.

== Mobile trading across a range of markets ==
• Trade on shares – get exposure to global shares and ETFs, including Apple, BP and Lloyds
• Trade on indices – based on the world’s leading underlying stock market indices
• Trade on cryptos – including bitcoin, ethereum and ripple
• Forex trading – take a view on major currency pairs like EUR/USD, GBP/USD and USD/JPY
• Trade on commodities – on instruments such as gold, silver and oil

== Instant access ==
• Once installed, just log in to your account – the app gives you instant access to your spread betting or CFD account, so you can monitor the markets, view and amend positions, and trade on live streaming prices
• You can also fund your account and customise advanced preferences, including preferred defaults 

== Key features and tools ==
• Advanced dynamic search, plus filter products by type, country, region, volatility and performance
• Advanced order tickets including stop-loss, trailing stop-loss, guaranteed stop-loss and boundary order options
• Price depth ladder for automated instant execution of significantly larger trade sizes
• Topical watchlists and mini ‘trend’ charts – view instrument details including spreads, margins, volatility and trading hours
• Multiple chart types with more than 40 technical analysis indicators and drawing tools
• Real-time market calendar with push alerts so you stay on top of crucial economic data as it’s released
• Reuters news service across all asset types and available within each instrument menu
• Client sentiment charts for every instrument, helping you to gain greater insight into the view of other traders
• CMC Markets analysts’ commentary via our 'Insights' tool

== Practise trading with our free demo ==
• Download the app and practise spread betting and CFD trading with our free demo account
• Includes £10,000 of virtual funds.


Find out more: www.cmcmarkets.com


----------------------------------
Spread bets and CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 70.5% of retail investor accounts lose money when spread betting and/or trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how spread bets and CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

*Awarded Best Mobile Phone/Tablet App based on highest user satisfaction among spread betters, CFD and FX traders, Investment Trends 2018 UK Leverage Trading Report.

description:
5/5 “I just won my first car in a pink-slip race! WOW, it was such a rush. I love this game!”
5/5 “Excellent drag racing game! It looks great and the short races are fun and addictive! I recommend it to everyone.”

Drag race across the world’s top cities behind the wheel of your favourite race machine!
Drive your best turbo-charged Supercar across the world’s most glamorous and popular cities in high-speed drag races. Raise the stakes, show your muscle, and then smash your way through rain, snowstorms or scorching heat, betting pink slips to win your rivals’ cars on amazing 3D streets.

Collect, customise and race full-power autos you've owned or the best speed machines you need to drive, ranging from classic muscle cars to new turbo Supercars. All licensed! Does that get your motor running?

Whether you bet small on each street run or need to study your opponents before betting pink slips, this is the most fun and intense quarter-mile of drag racing you’ve ever seen. Bets are available in single-player and multiplayer PvP battles.

Quick shift from single-player to multiplayer races fast for the live thrills and fun of challenging the world’s top driving opponents! Take part in cool races vs. 3 other players in real-time PvP clashes where only one can win, and the others will burn out in defeat.

You never know when a drag race will throw a new twist, like a blizzard, rainstorm or burning heat on the street. Each weather simulator can have a real effect on your and your rival racers’ driving. So don't lose your grip and nitro your auto over the finish line!

• RACE AROUND THE WORLD IN THE MOST STYLISH LOCATIONS
Try not to be distracted by the top-quality 3D HD environments when you need to pop a nitro canister in 3 of the world’s top cities for speed: New York, Paris and Hong Kong.

Going for a new look? Need some quick muscle upgrades? Then feel free to browse through numerous options to customise and power up your torque, nitro or engine power. Show your racer rivals real style with fun decals, and maximise your multiplayer performance with turbo speed, motor superchargers, nitro and much more.

description:

How to Play 
The Lobby 
1. To enter a room simply double touch or two touch on the Room area in room list. 
2. The status of room is “Playing”, or time stamp of remained time to play 
3. There are 4 types of room, Emerald, Sapphire, Diamond and Ruby. 
4. Each room type requires the minimum tick price. For example, a ticket price in Emerald is 5P and Diamond ticket’s 1￡. 


The Room 
1. When you fist visit a room, it’s divided into two columns. 
2. Right column is ticket list to buy. Another ticket list can be shown to swipe ticket list. 
3. Touch a ticket to buy, the status of ticket is changed to “Selected”. Touch “SELECT MAX TICKETS”, 18 tickets will be selected. 
4. Touch “BUY SELECTED TICKETS”, then all of tickets to be chose will be bought. 


The Game 
1. One of the great things with online Bingo is that you won’t need to worry about marking your cards as you go, the computer will do all this for you. 
2. While you enjoy the game or chat with your friends, our automatic daubers will mark your cards and keep a record of how many correct calls you need to win 
3. We’ll also ensure that your most complete cards are pushed to the front so you can make sure you’re watching the front of the race! 
4. We’ll flag it up each time someone wins and automatically credit your account! 

The Prize 
1st line pot : When All numbers of the first line on a ticket is called, you win 1st line pot 
2nd line pot : When All numbers of the second line on a ticket is called, you win 2nd line pot 
HOUSE : When All numbers of the all three line on a ticket is called, you win HOUSE Jackpot

Multiplayer Tournament Mode

Players compete for three minutes to see who can make the most credits. It’s fast, it’s furious, and it’s only on Born To Be Rich.

The Games

It’s what this app is famous for. We’ve received universal praise for the variety of games on offer.

Born to be Rich is our signature game. We love it so much we named the app after it. It has 5 reels and 30 lines and the aim of the game is to rack up luxury items. If you want to play the most exciting slots game ever, this one is for you.

Clubbing Nights is a 30 line slot game with a unique and exciting increasing multiplier feature during free games. 

La Patisserie is a 50 line slot game with different "power-up" wild symbols with special effects and massive payouts.

The features

This is what makes Born To Be Rich the only slots app you’ll ever need.

Incredible hourly and daily bonuses

The app sends you push notifications when your bonuses come through, and these bonuses are huge too, so you never run out of credits, ever.

Simulator

Feel like the real deal? The simulator takes you one step closer to the casino, with authentic slots play, based on the actual mathematical processes that real machines use. It’s tough and not for beginners. If it’s too much for you, switch back to Arcade mode. We won’t tell anyone.

Auto Spin

Double Up

title: Weight Loss Bet by HealthyWage
description:
Win up to $10,000 by making a "bet" on your own weight loss, or by participating in one of our many weight loss and fitness challenges. There’s a reason we paid out millions to our participants last year - our challenges are fun, effective, and people love to win money for losing weight!

According to one of our participants, “HealthyWage has flipped on a switch that I just couldn’t seem to get clicked on by myself. Not sure, or what science is behind it, but this...is astounding!”

We flip on that switch for participants looking to get healthier over and over again. In fact, 78% of our participants report weight loss¹ when participating in a HealthyWage Challenge, with an average prize payout of $1,239². Oh, and we DO know the science behind it. We’re kind of nerdy like that!

Check out some of the features you’ll enjoy with the HealthyWage app:

- Take and post-victory and before-and-after photos
- Participate with a vibrant community for support and accountability
- Keep track of your weight loss and your progress toward hitting your goal (and winning money!)
- Track your step activity throughout the day
- Create and submit your beginning and ending weigh-in verification videos
- Access your winnings to cash out or begin another challenge
- Keep an eye on your standing among other players
- Build friendships, get inspired by others success, and practice your best cheerleading skills
- Easily find and enter new challenges

There are 4 different types of HealthyWage Challenges you can join through the app. Those are:

The HealthyWager
Win up to $10,000 in an individual weight loss bet.  Set the terms using the Prize Calculator (you choose your weight loss goal, wager amount, etc.).  Play with the calculator all you like without commitment.

$10,000 Team Challenge
Teams of five compete to win cash prizes -- first prize is $10,000.

Jackpot Challenges
Individuals and teams try to achieve specific weight loss goals to earn a share of the pot.

Step Challenge
Individuals and teams connect step devices to calculate a custom goal. Achieve the step goal and earn a share of the pot! Devices available: Apple Health (Apple phones and watches via HealthKit), Garmin and Fitbit.

HealthyWage's weight loss challenges have been featured on the Today show, Good Morning America, CNN, ABC News, NBC News, Fox News, and in The Wall Street Journal & The New York Times.
From our participants:

“HealthyWage is great for motivation. People have good intentions but lack the motivation. After having to stick with it for a period of time, that helps you change your habits for good and a healthy lifestyle becomes your new habit.”

"HealthyWage really exploited my competitive nature and used it to work for me!”

“There's nothing better than losing weight, feeling great, getting healthy AND winning money at the same time!"

"Putting up my own money definitely helped me win...the thought of the prize kept me focused. And, as weight started to come off, I was very excited about the process. It was not as hard as I thought it would be once I got my mind focused. I would definitely (and have) recommended this program to my friends! For people who are competitive, it will definitely motivate them to win!”

“I would not have seen the results I got without HealthyWage. It offers something totally unique and takes away all the excuse.”

Once you experience the thrill of HealthyWage, you'll never go back to struggling on your own. Try it and see for yourself! Start a diet, bet on it, and win big! Losing weight and getting active with HealthyWage pays off in more ways than one!

¹As reported by HealthyWage participants from January 2019 through January 2020. Stat will be updated at least annually.
²The average prize amount varies seasonally.  The average listed here includes all new bets created from January 2019 through January 2020 and will be updated periodically.

title: Bet Spread
description:
Increase your chance of winning by spreading your stake over multiple bets. Don't kick yourself for putting the wrong bet on and back them all.

Bet Spread will tell you how much of your total stake to put on each bet and calculate the profit that you will make regardless of which bet wins.

Simply enter the total stake that you would like to bet.

Then enter the odds for each of the bets that you would like to place.

Bet Spread will perform a Dutching calculation that tells you how to spread your stake and how much profit you will make if any bet wins.

The calculator will work for horse racing, football or any betting that involves odds. Odds can be entered in fractional (5/1) or decimal (6.0) format.

title: Pocket Run Pool
description:
The return of arcade pool from the creator of Really Bad Chess and Flipflop Solitaire.

Pocket-Run Pool combines 8-ball pool with the thrill of a chasing the perfect highscore.

In Pocket-Run, your goal is to sink all the balls, but where and when you sink them is what matters most! 

With each pocketed ball, you're awarded points based on the pocket you sunk. So sink carefully, but watch out, with each miss or scratch you lose a life — run out before you finish the table and it's game over.

Compete against yourself, the world, or the bank in a variety of thrilling game modes!

Can you make the perfect pocket-run?

Arcade pool is back!

------WHAT THE CRITICS ARE SAYING

5/5 - Touch Arcade
"Help me, I can't stop playing!"

5/5 - 148Apps
"Most certainly the best pool game I've played on a phone"

"Like the best arcade games, this creates a “just one more turn” mentality" - The Verge

"a perfect little mobile game" - iMore.com

------WHATS IN THE “BOX”?

- Play Pocket-Run Pool's Standard, High Stakes, and Insta-Tournament modes for free!
- Asynchronously Go for gold against players from around the world in Insta-Tournament mode
- Manage your risk against all manner of game conditions (like the devious Cuewall) in High Stakes mode
- Unlock Break of The Week, alternate backgrounds, and remove Insta-Tournament buy-ins with a single In-App-Purchase of just $3.99
- Track stats for all four modes
- Win alternate pool cues and color schemes in High Stakes mode

------A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER

I've always loved pool, and when I got my first iPhone years ago, the world of digital pool games opened up to me. 

There are certainly a lot of options out there, but finding a simple and enjoyable single-player pool game was harder than I expected. I found one that I enjoyed, but after playing it extensively I found it too easy to beat the computer every time. Suddenly the problem with pool hit me — when you play against a computer in a physics simulation, you're literally playing against a god... By which I mean, either the computer is going easy on you (for a reason), or it's playing a perfect game and taking all your money.

It dawned on me that if I wanted a good single player pool game, I'd have to make a new kind of pool — a variant that doesn't need a computer opponent, that's built around the notion of scoring and improving, of taking risks, and of presenting unique and interesting challenges.

Pocket-Run Pool is the game I came up with, I hope you enjoy it!

-zach

title: Matched Betting Calculators
description:
matched betting |mætʃt bɛtɪŋ|: noun. 1. a bеtting technique used by individuals to profit from the free bets and incentives offered by bookmakers. It is generally considered risk-free as it is based on the application of a mathematical equation rather than chance.

Matched Betting Calculators is a suite of tools to help you make as much money from bookmaker offers as possible. You can access the Normal, Stake Not Returned and Stake Returned calculators straight away - these will give you the tools to calculate the lay stakes required to lay (essentially betting on the opposite outcome) your qualifying and free bets to ensure risk-free cash.

Once you understand the basics, Matched Betting Calculators goes beyond other apps to offer you an advanced suite of tools to calculate lay stakes for more complex offers.

The full app provides:

NORMAL CALCULATOR
Calculate lay stakes for qualifying and arbitrage bets.

STAKE NOT RETURNED CALCULATOR
Calculate lay stakes for free bets (stake not returned).

STAKE RETURNED CALCULATOR
Calculate lay stakes for free bets (stake returned).

ODDS MATCH BAR
Quickly view the closeness between your back and lay odds with the Odds Match Bar (available in Normal, SNR, Risk Free and Early Payout calculators).

TRIGGER CALCULATOR*
Calculate lay stakes for the initial and trigger bets when a free bet is provided after a certain condition is met (e.g., money back on losing correct score bets when a certain team wins).

RISK FREE CALCULATOR*
Guarantee a profit when there's money back as a free bet if your initial bet loses.

EXTRA PLACE CALCULATOR*
If a bookmaker is paying more places in a race than the exchange, calculate your profit should your horse finish in the extra place.

LAY SEQUENTIAL CALCULATOR*
Lay enhanced multiples when legs don't overlap - keep laying until one leg loses. If either the final leg loses or all legs win, you are in profit, otherwise it is risk-free.

ODDS BOOST CALCULATOR*
Guarantee profit when bookmakers are offering boosted odds with extra winnings over the original odds are paid as a free bet.

EARLY PAYOUT CALCULATOR*
If the bookmaker settles your bet as a winner early, guarantee profit by backing the original outcome again. Use the Cash Out slider to trade out part of your bet, while leaving the rest in play with potential for larger profit!

2-WAY & 3-WAY DUTCH CALCULATORS*
Instead of laying a bet, you can choose to cover all outcomes with back bets. Use these calculators to equalise profits when there are two or three mutually exclusive outcomes.

FRACTIONAL TO DECIMAL CONVERTER
Quickly convert fractional odds to decimal and copy them to the clipboard. Also see the implied chance of the outcome happening from the odds.

QUICK LINKS
Access popular exchanges and bookmakers quickly from the app.

SIMPLE EV TOOL
Calculate the expected value of a casino offer with wagering requirements.

HISTORY
View your logged bets to keep track of your profits over time.

CUSTOMISE APP ICON
Option for either a light or dark app icon.

*requires Premium Mode, available as an in-app purchase from Settings.

Download Matched Betting Calculators today - whether you are a novice or an experienced matched bettor, there is no easier way to calculate your lay stakes and profit on your mobile device. 

- - -

DISCLAIMER
Although every effort has been taken to ensure the accuracy of these calculators, you use them at your own risk and the developers shall not be held liable for any loss, financial or otherwise, resulting from this application's use or misuse. Please ensure betting is legal in your jurisdiction before placing any bets and you are of the required age.

title: BetConnect - Sports Betting
description:
betconnect is the world’s only social betting network that gives you access to the bets of professional gamblers. We send you personalised bets - each called a Bet Request - direct from the Pros for you to Match. You decide what to do next. Do you Follow or Lay?

Why betconnect?

1.  Real Pro Gamblers
Our Pros are real professional gamblers who are restricted or closed by the bookies due to their success. Why else would they pay us a commission to get their bets placed?

2.  In It Together
Our Pros are putting their money where their mouth is – every Bet Request is the ultimate tip. Each one is being backed by one of our Pros. You can trust that they want winners just as much as you.

3. Personalised Bets Come To You!
You get alerted when we have a Bet Request for you to Match based on your preferences. With access to the Pro’s stats, you 1can make an informed decision whether to Follow or Lay.

4. Time Is Money
Every Bet Request is so good you need to act fast to maximise value. Time is of the essence as you only have 15 minutes to Match and make your next decision…

5. Crowd Betting
Every Bet Request you receive is just the “tip” of the iceberg. Our Pros are usually staking much, much more. Our technology intelligently splits the stake and distributes it to Punters like you, so you can share in their success.

6. The Benefits Are All Yours!
When you Follow a Bet Request with other bookmakers you get to take advantage of their Free Bet, Money Back Special and Best Odds Guaranteed promotions. If you lay a Bet Request and you beat the Pro you pay zero commission on your profits.

How does it work?

Step 1: Connect
We Connect you to a network of professional gamblers. Restricted and often closed by the bookies due to their success, they have bets they want to place. That’s where you come in! You’ll be notified when the betconnect algorithm allocates you a Bet Request that meets your betting preferences

Don’t want to wait? Press the betconnect button to be next in the queue.

Step 2: Match
Unlock the Bet Request to reveal the details of the bet and get the ultimate tip! You now have 15 minutes to Match it on betconnect, safe in the knowledge that the same odds or better are available with the bookmakers… meanwhile you move on nicely to step 3.

Step 3: Follow
Here’s where it gets interesting…
Just how good is this Pro?

Love the bet?
Follow
Believe in the power of the Pro and Follow the same bet with your own money. Simply Match the Bet Request and place the same stake plus your own stake with any bookie who is offering the same odds or better. Get Involved!

Or simply
Lay
Be brave and bet against the Pro by becoming the bookie! Simply Match the Bet Request and do nothing further. Will bravery triumph over experience?

Want to see how it works? Visit https://www.betconnect.com/punter/demo/

title: RunBet - Run more, Earn more
description:
Make running fun again with a RunBet game! Social support, achievable goals, and real rewards set you up for success in achieving your goals, no matter your running experience.

REAL MONEY, REAL MOTIVATION
RunBet is the perfect app for anyone who needs an extra push to start or stick to a running routine. You bet on yourself to achieve your running goals (having real money on the line turns your motivation up to the max ... seriously, it’s amazing) and when you do, you cash out. You don’t have to run faster or longer than the other players to win — just achieve your goals, and you’re a winner!

RUN AT ANY LEVEL
Whether you want to start a running habit, lose weight, train for a 5K, or just hold yourself accountable to run more, there’s a RunBet game at the right level for you. 

ACHIEVABLE GOALS
Each game comes has its own running schedule with concrete, manageable goals. RunBet’s race training games are designed by an expert running coach with 21 marathons under her belt.

SOCIAL SUPPORT
Running is more fun with other people. RunBet games provide a fun, supportive community of other like-minded players cheering you on.

GETTING STARTED
Getting started on your new and improved running habit is easy. Here’s how:
1. Download the RunBet app. 
2. Browse the game directory to find the right game for you. 
3. Bet on yourself! Pay your bet into the pot to officially join.
4. Complete your runs. Each game has its own run schedule.
5. Win and split the pot!

You can submit your runs by tracking them with Runkeeper, Strava, or Garmin. You can also run on a treadmill and submit them using our special 2-photo verification process.

Our team of Referees is standing by to help 24/7 with any technical difficulties or questions! Just email us at support@waybetter.com. 

Can you become a better, faster, happier runner? You bet!
releaseNotes: This latest update includes some design changes and bug fixes. Please contact support@waybetter.com with questions and if you are enjoying RunBet, rate us on the store!
